message: The corpse of the monster I should've shot dead is gone.
Mrs. Hudson probably carried it off somewhere.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Ah......why did it have to come to this......

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Are you still planning to torment me？

name: Gardner
message: Sounds like he's talking to someone.

name: Jonathan
message: But it seemed like we were the only ones in the village.
Besides, I can't imagine Mrs. Hudson casually inviting someone into her own room.

name: Gardner
message: See, you can hear the voice right now！
What the heck is going on......
Should I try talking to them?
Right now, that guy's popping up all over the village.

name: Jonathan
message: You might not know since you weren’t there, madam, but Cordelia and I almost had something really terrible happen to us.

name: Jonathan
message: Speaking of which, where did you go, Mrs. Hudson？　　　　　　　　You’ve been gone since last night‥‥‥‥‥
It sounded like there was a gunshot.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: That's right‥‥‥‥now I can feel safe‥‥‥‥

name: Jonathan
message: I heard you talking with someone earlier‥‥‥
What happened, I can't see him.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: The one you shot and killed earlier was my husband.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Ever since you all came to Arkham, I thought this day might　　　　　　　　　come.
Why are you in that kind of shape...

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: It wasn't like that at first.
Back when I came to Arkham, you know.

name: Jonathan
message: So, what Thomas was saying was......
The stuff about my master and kid that I can't tell anyone about...
There’s no point in hiding it now, right?

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: That』s right, my husband is a Deep One！
I'm a filthy woman who slept with that bizarre monster and even had its child.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: That's what happens to people in this village when they get old.
It's better to be in the sea than living on land.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: It's true, and on top of that, it varies from person to person. For my husband, it happened when he was still young.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: But you know, that's something to be proud of.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: He might just be a monster to you, but　　　　　　　　　he's my master！
But you know, even after all that, I still love my husband.　　　　　　　　　If he wants me, I'll share the Bed with him.

name: Jonathan
message: What the hell are those guys?
Why do the people in the village end up like that?
I just hate being left behind all alone, that's all.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: My husband and children are gone, so why am I the only one who has to stay here？

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: No, I have no intention of doing that, and even if I did, it would be impossible.
I'll take Cordelia and leave this village.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: It's impossible... especially for you two.

name: Jonathan
message: What's so wrong about me and Cordelia！
I don't even want to see your face.
